text: A great service to leave baggage with them at cruise terminal and pick up at airport, leaving us free to enjoy day in Singapore. Was dead on time with great communication.

We used Porter Express for transfers from the airport and around Singapore to our golf days. Honestly, if it wasn't for their hospitality and outstanding service our trip would not have been so great. They literally go over and above to make sure you're looked after. Couldn't recommend enough
Thanks again Porter Xpress
PS. James you're a legend!
Blake
Great service and convenience! Used porter services for transfers and also to store my baggage whilst went for a cruise from Singapore . Great customer relations and kept giving me updates

Best airport transport service, you just tell them where you want to go and it charges you accordingly.i use the limousine service to bring me in my hotel and our important luggage was stored form them too..  i recommend this company for those traveling to singapore.
